truck_serial_number.question: What is the truck serial number?

inspection_employee_id.question: What is the inspection employee ID?

date_time_of_inspection.question: What is the date and time of the inspection?

location_of_inspection.question: What is the location of the inspection?

geo_coordinates_of_inspection.question: What are the geo coordinates of the inspection?

service_meter_hours.question: What are the service meter hours of Odometer reading?

customer_name_company_name.question: What is the customer's name or company name?

cat_customer_id.question: What is the CAT customer ID?

tire_pressure_left_front.question: What is the tire pressure for the left front tire?

tire_pressure_right_front.question: What is the tire pressure for the right front tire?

tire_condition_left_front.question: What is the condition of the left front tire? Is it Good or Ok or Needs Replacement?

tire_condition_right_front.question: What is the condition of the right front tire? Is it Good or Ok or Needs Replacement?

tire_pressure_left_rear.question: What is the tire pressure for the left rear tire?

tire_pressure_right_rear.question: What is the tire pressure for the right rear tire?

tire_condition_left_rear.question: What is the condition of the left rear tire? Is it Good or Ok or Needs Replacement?

tire_condition_right_rear.question: What is the condition of the right rear tire? Is it Good or Ok or Needs Replacement?

overall_tire_summary.question: Please provide an overall tire summary.

tire_images.question: Attach images of each tire in the same order.

battery_replacement_date.question: What is the battery replacement date?

battery_water_level.question: What is the battery water level? Is it Good or Ok or Low?

battery_condition.question: Is there any damage to the battery? (Yes/No). If yes, please attach an image.

battery_leak_rust.question: Is there any leak or rust in the battery? (Yes/No)

battery_overall_summary.question: Please provide an overall battery summary (less than 1000 characters).

rust_dent_damage.question: Is there any rust, dent, or damage to the exterior? (Yes/No). If yes, please explain in the notes and attach images.

oil_leak_suspension.question: Is there any oil leak in the suspension? (Yes/No)

overall_summary.question: Please provide an overall summary (1000 character notes).

brake_fluid_level.question: What is the brake fluid level? (Good, Ok, Low)

brake_condition_front.question: What is the condition of the front brakes? (Good, Ok, Needs Replacement)

brake_condition_rear.question: What is the condition of the rear brakes? (Good, Ok, Needs Replacement)

emergency_brake.question: What is the condition of the emergency brake? (Good, Ok, Low)

brake_overall_summary.question: Please provide an overall brake summary (less than 1000 characters).

rust_dents_damage_engine.question: Is there any rust, dent, or damage to the engine? (Yes/No). If yes, please explain in the notes and attach images.

engine_oil_condition.question: What is the condition of the engine oil? (Good/Bad)

engine_oil_color.question: What is the color of the engine oil? (Clean/Brown/Black etc)

brake_fluid_condition.question: What is the condition of the brake fluid? (Good/Bad)

brake_fluid_color.question: What is the color of the brake fluid? (Clean/Brown/Black etc)

oil_leak_engine.question: Is there any oil leak in the engine? (Yes/No)

engine_overall_summary.question: Please provide an overall engine summary (less than 1000 characters).

customer_feedback.question: Did the customer provide any feedback?

issue_images.question: Attach images related to the issues discussed with the customer.
